always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

msg.content: Can you assist in creating a 5-day long itinerary? I am planning to leave Omaha on March 2nd, 2022, visit 2 different cities in Washington, and return by March 6th, 2022. I will be traveling alone with a budget set to $5,000.

Can you assist in creating a 5-day long itinerary? I am planning to leave Omaha on March 2nd, 2022, visit 2 different cities in Washington, and return by March 6th, 2022. I will be traveling alone with a budget set to $5,000.

function.name: submit_day_plan
function.arguments: {"day": 1, "current_city": "Omaha to Seattle", "transportation": "Flight: Delta Airlines DL3377, Omaha to Seattle, Departure Time: 06:15, Arrival Time: 08:05", "breakfast": "-", "attraction": "-", "lunch": "-", "dinner": "-", "accommodation": "Seattle City Centre Apartments"}

function.name: submit_day_plan
function.arguments: {"day": 2, "current_city": "Seattle", "transportation": "-", "breakfast": "Cinnamon Works, Seattle", "attraction": "Space Needle, Seattle; Pioneer Square, Seattle; Pike Place Market, Seattle;", "lunch": "Pike Place Chowder, Seattle", "dinner": "The Pink Door, Seattle", "accommodation": "Seattle City Centre Apartments"}

function.name: submit_day_plan
function.arguments: {"day": 3, "current_city": "Seattle", "transportation": "-", "breakfast": "The Crumpet Shop, Seattle", "attraction": "Chihuly Garden and Glass Museum, Seattle; Seattle Aquarium, Seattle;", "lunch": "Elliott's Oyster House, Seattle", "dinner": "Tilikum Place Cafe, Seattle", "accommodation": "Seattle City Centre Apartments"}

function.name: submit_day_plan
function.arguments: {"day": 4, "current_city": "Seattle to Spokane", "transportation": "Flight: Alaska Airlines AS3261, Seattle to Spokane, Departure Time: 09:30, Arrival Time: 10:45", "breakfast": "-", "attraction": "-", "lunch": "-", "dinner": "-", "accommodation": "Cozy Studio in the Heart of Downtown Spokane!"}
